update all_device set device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_phone = #{devicePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plate_number = #{plateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, speed_limit = #{speedLimit,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oil_coefficient = #{oilCoefficient,jdbcType=REAL}, maintain_distance_period = #{maintainDistancePeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_maintain_kilometre = #{lastMaintainKilometre,jdbcType=INTEGER}, filter_lbs = #{filterLbs,jdbcType=BIT}, device_contact = #{deviceContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_user_id = #{deviceUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_password = #{devicePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_status = #{deviceStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, connect_status = #{connectStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, device_icon = #{deviceIcon,jdbcType=TINYINT}, device_imei = #{deviceImei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_category = #{deviceCategory,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, active_time = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, due_time = #{dueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, device_note = #{deviceNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
